articles.title: 2025 Changed the Media Business. Next Year Could Be Even More Turbulent.
articles.mainIdea: 2025 Changed the Media Business. Next Year Could Be Even More Turbulent.
articles.summary: Barrons.com: 2025 Changed the Media Business. Next Year Could Be Even More Turbulent.. Headlines regarding the battle for Warner Bros. just scratch the surface of how busy this year has been for the media industry. Related tickers mentioned: NFLX, VSNTV, WBD.

articles.title: Fidelity Contrafund’s Will Danoff Is Getting Closer to Handing Off the Reins
articles.mainIdea: Fidelity Contrafund’s Will Danoff Is Getting Closer to Handing Off the Reins
articles.summary: Barrons.com: Fidelity Contrafund’s Will Danoff Is Getting Closer to Handing Off the Reins. The legendary manager has taken on two co-managers to help him run the mammoth fund. Just don’t use the word “retirement.” Related tickers mentioned: AAPL, BRK-B, MCD, META.

articles.title: Tech groups shift $120bn of AI data centre debt off balance sheets
articles.mainIdea: Tech groups shift $120bn of AI data centre debt off balance sheets
articles.summary: Financial Times: Tech groups shift $120bn of AI data centre debt off balance sheets. Tech companies have moved more than $120bn of data centre spending off their balance sheets using special purpose vehicles funded by Wall Street... Related tickers mentioned: BLK, CRWV, JPM, META, ORCL, XAAI.PVT.
